column4: Hi all. I'm no ubuntu user, nor am I a troll, I'm just doing research. Having said that, what kind of stuff works out of the box in Ubuntu (e.g. digital camera, flash drive, etc)?
and that's a true reflection of what ubuntu is capable of?
live cd is the live image of the install cd ... of course once you install you got more options but you want right out of the box without any tweaking
